overview: "Single" is a psychological investigation drama that sharply points out the lack of communication between families that is emerging as a recent social problem, depicting the truth about the death of Yuri's daughter - who potentially ended her life by suicide and the conflict between her mother and daughter. Jang Seo Hee takes on the role of Hye Young, a mother who is going through the pain of the sudden death of the daughter she loves. Hye Young is a character who is baffled by new truths that are unraveled as the relevant investigation is conducted.
title: Singles
